hero.title: Transform Your Sound
hero.subtitle: Professional audio production, voice-over services, and sound engineering. Bringing your creative vision to life with pristine audio quality.

voiceOver.title: Voice Over: Expressive & Versatile
voiceOver.description: From Moroccan Darija to Classical Arabic, I bring authentic emotion and impact to your words. My versatile voice delivers the perfect tone for your commercials, narrations, and audio productions.

audioProduction.title: Sound Mixing & Production: Elevate Your Audio
audioProduction.description: Transform raw recordings into polished soundscapes. I craft immersive audio experiences that capture your message's essence and engage listeners on a deeper level.

mixingMastering.title: Audio Recording: Professional Sound Quality
mixingMastering.description: Capture flawless audio in my acoustically optimized studio. Professional equipment and technical expertise ensure exceptional quality for your music, podcasts, and voice projects.

projects.question: What types of projects do you handle?
projects.answer: We handle a wide range of audio projects including voice-overs, music production, sound editing, and mixing/mastering for various media formats

timeline.question: How long does a typical project take?
timeline.answer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity. Simple voice-overs might take 1-2 days, while full album production could take several weeks

rates.question: What are your rates?
rates.answer: Rates vary based on project scope and requirements. Contact us for a custom quote tailored to your specific needs

remote.question: Do you offer remote services?
remote.answer: Yes, we offer remote services for clients worldwide, with seamless communication and file delivery systems in place

about.title: About Us
about.description1: With over a decade of experience in professional audio production, we've helped countless clients achieve their sonic vision. From voice-over work for major brands to full album production for independent artists, our expertise spans the entire audio spectrum.
about.description2: Our state-of-the-art studio is equipped with the latest technology and vintage equipment, allowing us to deliver the perfect blend of classic warmth and modern clarity in every project.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your project? Get in touch with us today.
